tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
  target_audience VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  purchase_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
  target_gender VARCHAR(10),
  target_age_range VARCHAR(20),
  budget DECIMAL(12, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL,
    purchase_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_gender VARCHAR,
    target_age_range VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE ad_impressions (
    impression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    impression_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ad_campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    purchase_amount DECIMAL,
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    income DECIMAL,
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    target_age_group VARCHAR(20),
    target_gender VARCHAR(10),
    target_income_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_impressions (
    impression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT REFERENCES ad_campaigns(campaign_id),
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    impression_date DATE,
    click_count INT
);
